item.title: NPC kill tele
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:5, topic:264326”]client.java:10939: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable KilledNPCID
loacation: class client[/quote]

Well, relating back to conventions i would use this.


  if(killedNPCID == 2627) { // Added this bracket opening.
     teleportToX = 2484;
     teleportToY = 5139;
     sendMessage("You are teleported to the next round. Good luck."); // added better conventions.. -.-
  }

If that doesn’t work, you will be forced to initialize the field yourself.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock

@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Setsuna, post:1, topic:264326”]I added this code in with my custom command teleports since I have no idea where I would put it:

teleportToX = 2484;
teleportToY = 5139;
sendMessage(“You are teleported to the next round. Good luck.”);

}

And I get 100 errors. Any help? Thanks to Jc, btw, for the code…[/quote]

Well, correct bracket use would go good in this situation.


  if(KilledNPCID == 2627) { // Added this bracket opening.
     teleportToX = 2484;
     teleportToY = 5139;
     sendMessage("You are teleported to the next round. Good luck."); // added better conventions.. -.-
  }
